record.field: <data> <xpath expr="/form/group[@id="gr_boolean"]/field[@name="customer"]" position="after"> <label name="employee" /> <field name="employee" xexpand="0" width="25"/> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/notebook/page[@id="contacts"]/field[@name="parent_party"]" position="after"> <label name="manager"/> <field name="manager"/> </xpath> <!--> expr="/form/notebook/page[@id="accounting"]" <xpath expr="/form/label[@name="name"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="name"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/label[@name="code"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="code"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/label[@name="active"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="active"]" position="replace"> </xpath> <--> </data>
